prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with sleek fur and striking red accents.
Imagine a bipedal creature that blends agility with stealth for its movements.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a humanoid figure with ice-themed elements.
Generate a creature with sharp features and a playful yet cunning personality.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and has a sharp focus.
Make a Pokemon that uses speed and cunning to outsmart its opponents in battle.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that has a unique blend of dark and ice abilities.

distinctive_features: Red feather-like crest on the head
